{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3417839,"name":"Ada T","username":"cmdada","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/cmdada/{size}/230870_2.png","created_at":"2024-08-24T20:10:31.923Z","cooked":"

Opening REV hardware client, I can write a CAN ID to the PDH. However, when I view a motor controller (ie spark max or spark flex), there is no “burn flash” button to sign a new can ID. Any thoughts?

-Adam bass

image4032×3024 3.03 MB

image4032×3024 2.92 MB
